entries.name: mp:compose
entries.intent: Resolve an intent into an ordered plugin composition plan using greedy set cover and Kahn's topological sort

entries.name: mp:dev
entries.intent: Plugin Dev Studio — hot-reload dev server, interactive playground, dependency graph visualization, and validation suite for plugin development.

entries.name: mp:help
entries.intent: Show all available marketplace-pro commands organized by module

entries.name: mp:lock
entries.intent: Manage deterministic lockfiles for reproducible plugin installations across environments

entries.name: mp:policy
entries.intent: Manage and evaluate security policies controlling plugin installation and registry access

entries.name: mp:quick
entries.intent: Rapid single-purpose marketplace actions — scan, trust, check, graph

entries.name: mp:recommend
entries.intent: Scan the current project and recommend plugins based on detected stack, patterns, and capability gaps

entries.name: mp:registry
entries.intent: Manage federated plugin registries with priority-based resolution and policy enforcement

entries.name: mp:setup
entries.intent: Interactive setup wizard for marketplace-pro — configures federation, security policies, and project intelligence in one command

entries.name: mp:status
entries.intent: Dashboard view of the entire marketplace-pro ecosystem — federation, security, intelligence, lockfile, and dev status

entries.name: mp:trust
entries.intent: Compute supply chain trust score and security audit for a plugin

entries.name: mp:verify
entries.intent: Verify signature integrity of a .cpkg plugin bundle
